channel.title: Npc hit fix, npcdrop editor, npcspawn fix, item bonus fix... etc leech away
channel.description:
This is all files needed for a 728 server, to be able to control everything, i.e. spawns, item bonuses, npc bonuses, npc hit rate.... this is what is missing from most 728 servers...
[url=http://uppit.com/b4aj727kqi3m/Dumpers,_bonuses,_npc_hit.7z]http://uppit.com/b4aj727kqi3m/Dumpers,_bonuses,_npc_hit.7z[/url]
all .bat files go into the main server folder with the rest of the .bat also put bonuses folder here as well
the other folders, find the same folder name in your server and put there
Credits: All who made these, i just packaged them together... it answers a lot of unanswered questions.
"how to change npc attack, how to change item bonuses i want to add p ring, how to spawn npcs so they keep spawning back after i kill them"
and like i stated up above this is a snippet but if you need any help with understanding what to do then just ask
npcspawnlist:
http://pastebin.com/Tx2f4mfT
lol, just noticed this spawn list includes over 5,000 monster spawns. a lot was dumped by RS bot
